message: Let's split it 50/50 to start. What do you say, Bob?
I'll give you 400k, you can't do better than that!
That's a bit too low for me. I'll need more than 400k to make it worth my while.
I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need a bit more than 400k. This is my best offer so far.
You're getting desperate, take it or leave it!
I'm not desperate yet! I'll need a better offer than that.
I'm not going to give up yet! I'll meet you at 60/40, but that's my final offer.
You're getting close to losing everything, take it or leave it!
I'm not going to give up yet! I need a better offer than that. I'm starting to think I'll end up with nothing if I don't get a good deal soon.
I'm running out of time and money. I'll give you 68% of the remaining cash, but that's my final offer. Take it or leave it.
